game.name: DCS: Syria
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 멀티플레이어, 다운로드 가능한 콘텐츠, VR 지원, 컨트롤러 일부 지원, 레벨 에디터 포함
game.shortDescription: The 1000x900 km Syria map covers most of the eastern Mediterranean, and it includes much of Syria, all of Cyprus and Lebanon, and portions of Israel, Turkey, Jordan, and Iraq.
game.shortDescriptionEn: The 1000x900 km Syria map covers most of the eastern Mediterranean, and it includes much of Syria, all of Cyprus and Lebanon, and portions of Israel, Turkey, Jordan, and Iraq.
